mapper.sql: SELECT P.PRO_NO, P.PRO_SEL_NO, P.PRO_NAME, P.PRO_BRAND, P.PRO_CATEGORY1, P.PRO_CATEGORY2, P.PRO_TAG, P.PRO_IMG, P.PRO_QTY, P.PRO_OPRICE, P.PRO_SPRICE, P.PRO_DEL_FEE, P.PRO_LTIME, P.PRO_CONTENT, P.PRO_RDATE, P.PRO_STATUS, P.PRO_REVIEW_COUNT, P.PRO_RATING FROM PRODUCT P JOIN MEMBER M ON(P.PRO_SEL_NO = M.MEM_NO) WHERE P.PRO_STATUS = 'Y' AND (PRO_NAME || PRO_TAG LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%') AND PRO_CATEGORY1 LIKE '%' || #{proCategory1} || '%' AND PRO_CATEGORY2 LIKE '%' || #{proCategory2} || '%'
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PRODUCT WHERE PRO_STATUS='Y'

SELECT P.PRO_NO, P.PRO_SEL_NO, P.PRO_NAME, P.PRO_BRAND, P.PRO_CATEGORY1, P.PRO_CATEGORY2, P.PRO_TAG, P.PRO_IMG, P.PRO_QTY, P.PRO_OPRICE, P.PRO_SPRICE, P.PRO_DEL_FEE, P.PRO_LTIME, P.PRO_CONTENT, P.PRO_RDATE, P.PRO_STATUS, P.PRO_REVIEW_COUNT, P.PRO_RATING FROM PRODUCT P JOIN MEMBER M ON(P.PRO_SEL_NO = M.MEM_NO) WHERE P.PRO_STATUS = 'Y' AND (PRO_NAME || PRO_TAG LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%') ORDER BY P.PRO_NO DESC

SELECT P.PRO_NO, P.PRO_SEL_NO, P.PRO_NAME, P.PRO_BRAND, P.PRO_CATEGORY1, P.PRO_CATEGORY2, P.PRO_TAG, P.PRO_IMG, P.PRO_QTY, P.PRO_OPRICE, P.PRO_SPRICE, P.PRO_DEL_FEE, P.PRO_LTIME, P.PRO_CONTENT, P.PRO_RDATE, P.PRO_STATUS, P.PRO_REVIEW_COUNT, P.PRO_RATING FROM PRODUCT P JOIN MEMBER M ON(P.PRO_SEL_NO = M.MEM_NO) WHERE P.PRO_STATUS = 'Y' AND P.PRO_NO = #{proNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT ( PRO_NO, PRO_SEL_NO, PRO_NAME, PRO_BRAND, PRO_CATEGORY1, PRO_CATEGORY2, PRO_TAG, PRO_IMG, PRO_QTY, PRO_OPRICE, PRO_SPRICE, PRO_DEL_FEE, PRO_LTIME, PRO_CONTENT, PRO_RDATE, PRO_STATUS, PRO_REVIEW_COUNT, PRO_RATING ) VALUES ( SEQ_PRO_NO.NEXTVAL, #{proSelNo}, #{proName}, #{proBrand}, #{proCategory1}, #{proCategory2}, #{proTag}, #{renamedFileName}, #{proQty}, #{proOPrice}, #{proSPrice}, #{proDelFee}, #{proLTime}, #{proContent}, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, #{proRating} )

UPDATE PRODUCT
PRO_NAME = #{ proName },
PRO_BRAND = #{ proBrand },
PRO_CATEGORY1 = #{ proCategory1 },
PRO_CATEGORY2 = #{ proCategory2 },
PRO_TAG = #{ proTag },
PRO_IMG = #{ renamedFileName },
PRO_QTY = #{ proQty },
PRO_OPRICE = #{ proOPrice },
PRO_SPRICE = #{ proSPrice },
PRO_DEL_FEE = #{ proDelFee },
PRO_LTIME = #{ proLTime },
PRO_CONTENT = #{ proContent }
WHERE PRO_NO = #{ proNo }
UPDATE PRODUCT SET PRO_STATUS = #{ proStatus } WHERE PRO_NO = #{ proNo }
INSERT INTO CART ( CART_NO, CART_MEM_NO, PRO_NO, PRO_COUNT ) VALUES ( SEQ_PRO_NO.NEXTVAL, #{ no }, #{ proNo }, #{ proCount } )
DELETE FROM CART WHERE CART_NO = #{ cartNo }
mapper.update: UPDATE CART SET PRO_COUNT = #{ proCount } WHERE CART_NO = #{ cartNo }
mapper.select: SELECT C.CART_NO, C.CART_MEM_NO, C.PRO_NO, C.PRO_COUNT, P.PRO_NAME, P.PRO_BRAND, P.PRO_IMG, P.PRO_OPRICE, P.PRO_SPRICE, P.PRO_DEL_FEE, P.PRO_LTIME FROM CART C LEFT JOIN PRODUCT P ON(C.PRO_NO = P.PRO_NO) WHERE C.CART_MEM_NO = #{ no }
SELECT CART_NO, CART_MEM_NO, PRO_NO, PRO_COUNT FROM CART WHERE CART_MEM_NO = #{ no } AND PRO_NO = #{ proNo }
SELECT PRO_NO, PRO_NAME, PRO_BRAND, PRO_IMG, PRO_OPRICE, PRO_SPRICE, PRO_DEL_FEE, PRO_LTIME FROM PRODUCT WHERE PRO_NO = #{ proNo }
SELECT MEM_NO, MEM_NAME, MEM_PHONE, MEM_ZONECODE, MEM_ADDRESS, MEM_SUBADDRESS, MEM_EMAIL, MEM_POINT FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_NO = #{ memNo }
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PAYMENT ( PAY_NO, PAY_MEM_NO, PAY_ADDRESS, PAY_SUBADDRESS, PAY_METHOD, PAY_DEL_FEE, PAY_TOTAL_PRICE, PAY_USING_POINT, PAY_SAVING_POINT, PAY_FINAL_PRICE, PAY_COMMENT, PAY_STATUS, PAY_CREATED_AT ) VALUES ( #{ payNo }, #{ no }, #{ address }, #{ subaddress }, #{ payMethod }, #{ totalDelFee }, #{ totalPrice }, #{ usingPoint }, #{ totalSavingPoint }, #{ totalPriceAfterUsingPoint }, #{ orderComment }, '결제완료', #{ payCreatedAt } )

INSERT INTO PAYMENT_ITEMS ( PAY_ITEM_NO, PAY_NO, PRO_NO, PRO_COUNT, PRO_NAME, PRO_BRAND, PRO_OPRICE, PRO_SPRICE, PRO_IMG, PRO_DEL_FEE, PRO_LTIME, PRO_FINAL_PRICE, PRO_SAVING_POINT ) VALUES ( SEQ_PAY_ITEM_NO.NEXTVAL, #{ payNo }, #{ proNo }, #{ proCount }, #{ proName }, #{ proBrand }, #{ proOPrice }, #{ proSPrice }, #{ renamedFileName }, #{ proDelFee }, #{ proLTime }, #{ eachProTotalPrice }, #{ savingPoint } )
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET MEM_POINT = #{ point } WHERE MEM_NO = #{ no }
UPDATE PRODUCT SET PRO_QTY = #{ proQty } WHERE PRO_NO = #{ proNo }
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM CART WHERE CART_MEM_NO = #{ no } AND PRO_NO = #{ proNo }
mapper.update: UPDATE PRODUCT SET PRO_RATING = #{ proRatingAvg } WHERE PRO_NO = #{ proNo }
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REVIEW WHERE REV_PRO_NO = #{ prono } AND REV_STATUS='Y'

SELECT M.MEM_NAME, R.REV_CONTENT, R.REV_RENAMEIMG, REV_DATE, R.REV_SCORE FROM REVIEW R JOIN MEMBER M ON M.MEM_NO = R.REV_WRITER_NO WHERE REV_PRO_NO = #{ prono } AND REV_STATUS='Y' ORDER BY REV_PRO_NO DESC

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS "R_NO", PRO_NO, PRO_NAME, PRO_BRAND, PRO_IMG, PRO_CATEGORY1, PRO_CATEGORY2, PRO_TAG, PRO_RATING, PRO_STATUS FROM (SELECT * FROM PRODUCT WHERE PRO_RATING > 0 AND PRO_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY PRO_RATING DESC)) WHERE 1 <= R_NO AND R_NO <= 4
SELECT PRO_NO, PRO_NAME FROM PRODUCT WHERE PRO_NO = #{proNo}
